details.title: Business Development and Data Analysis
details.description: Researched and analyzed thousands of companies to identify ideal customer profile (ICP) matches for targeted outreach strategies. Utilized Salesforce CRM and other business intelligence tools to manage prospect data and track client engagement.

details.title: Quality Assurance (QA)
details.description: Performed manual QA testing to verify website functionality and ensure optimal user experience. Collaborated with developers to identify and resolve issues.

details.title: Collaboration and Process Improvement
details.description: Collaborated with an international team to refine lead qualification processes and improve conversion rates. Gained valuable insights into data-driven decision-making and B2B business development strategies.

details.title: Staff Scheduling and Resource Allocation
details.description: Coordinated complex staff scheduling across multiple game types. Developed effective solutions for unexpected staffing challenges and operational disruptions, ensuring smooth operations in a fast-paced environment.

details.title: Communication and Team Management
details.description: Served as a liaison between management and game presenters, facilitating clear communication. Demonstrated high levels of accountability and discipline while handling multiple concurrent responsibilities.

details.title: Skill Development
details.description: Enhanced English language proficiency through daily interactions with international colleagues. Strengthened time management, problem-solving, and adaptability skills while working in a diverse team.
